plot: Documentary about the disputable connection between the lawyer and politician Gregor Gysi and the former East German intelligence service ("Staatssicherheit").
title: Die Akte Gysi
plot_es: Documentary about the disputable connection between the lawyer and politician Gregor Gysi and the former East German intelligence service ("Staatssicherheit").
plot_en: Documentary about the disputable connection between the lawyer and politician Gregor Gysi and the former East German intelligence service ("Staatssicherheit").
